title: China is authoritarian but mixed economic system

content.question: China's current economic and political systems can best be described as which of the following?

choices.label: Economic System: Centralized MarxistPolitical System: Parliamentary

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
